name: lime rice
author: mookman288
description: This is a vegetarian Mexican rice flavored with lime.
recipe: Place &$0 in two quart or larger saucepan
Add &$1 and fry on medium heat until lightly brown
Mince &$2 and fry with &$3 and &$4 for 30-45 seconds
Add &$5 and &$6; warning: may steam loudly
Increase heat to high and mix ingredients thoroughly
When liquid begins to boil, cover, and reduce heat to low
After 15 minutes, remove from heat and let rest for 10-20 minutes
